description: Numbers n such that 243*2^n-1 is prime.
links: Lei Zhou, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..67
Ray Ballinger and Wilfrid Keller, List of primes k.2^n + 1 for k < 300
Wilfrid Keller, List of primes k.2^n - 1 for k < 300
L. Soule and K. Bonath, Riesel Prime database
Index entries for sequences of n such that k*2^n-1 (or k*2^n+1) is prime
mathematica: b=3^5; i=0; Table[While[i++; cp=b*2^i-1; !PrimeQ[cp]]; i, {j, 1, 33}] (* _Lei Zhou_, Nov 08 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 29 1999
extensions: More terms from Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Jan 02 2008
